svg.title: XML4NGS : A XML-based description of a Next-Generation sequencing project allowing the generation of a ’Makefile’-driven workflow.

cc:Work.dc:title: XML4NGS : A XML-based description of a Next-Generation sequencing project allowing the generation of a ’Makefile’-driven workflow.

rdf:Bag.rdf:li: xml ngs bioinformatics make makefile workflow cluster

cc:Work.dc:description: XML4NGS is a schema describing a NGS experiment in XML. It provides a XSLT stylesheet transforming the XML into a Makefile-driven workflow allowing a parallel analysis (alignment, calling, annotation ... ) on a cluster.

text.tspan: XML4NGS : A XML-based description of a Next-Generation sequencing project
allowing the generation of a ’Makefile’-driven workflow.
Pierre Lindenbaum, Raluca Teusan, Solena Le Scouarnec, Audrey Bihouee et Richard Redon
